text: K. Pappu (died 11 July 2005) was an Indian film director, producer and screenwriter. He directed films such as Ucha Dar Babe Nanak Da (1982), Jigri Yaar (1984), Mohabbat Ki Kasam (1986), Vishnu-Devaa (1991), Ayee Milan Ki Raat (1991), Izzat Ki Roti (1993), Maha Shaktishaali (1994) and Raghuveer (1995). ==References== Category:20th-century Indian film directors Category:Hindi film producers Category:Indian male screenwriters Category:2005 deaths Category:Year of birth missing Category:20th-century Indian screenwriters
title: K. Pappu
